Detailed Description

This class creates a light map for casting clouds on the environment.

void SkyLightMap::update ( float  sunAngle,
const Vector2 &  strataMovement 
)

This method updates the sky light map, which either recalculates the map given the current cloud data, or shifts the texture transform by an amount equal to the wind speed.
